blogPost.excerpt: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
blogPost.body: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
blogPost.title: Networking Emails - 100+ proven email templates to help your career in 2021
blogPost.author: Rohan Mahtani

localize.description: 职场邮件》是一套优秀的邮件模板，涵盖了多种人脉关系的情况，包括如何向行业领导请教、给校友发冷邮件、与人跟进、写有效的LinkedIn连接请求说明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的邮件模板，为你的2021年事业发展助力

localize.description: 職場郵件》是一套優秀的郵件模板，涵蓋了多種人脈關係的情況，包括如何向行業領導請教、給校友發冷郵件、與人跟進、寫有效的LinkedIn連接請求說明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的郵件模板，爲你的2021年事業發展助力

previous.excerpt: Planning a Clubhouse meetup soon? Then you need to invite to your room as many people as possible. Let’s do it via social media: Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. Put your content on the main artboard and get cards for all three platforms at once.
previous.title: Clubhouse Cards - Announce your next meetup to as many people as possible

localize.description: 计划近期举行会所聚会？那么你需要邀请尽可能多的人到你的房间。让我们通过社交媒体来进行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的内容放在主图板上，一次获得三个平台的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向尽可能多的人宣布你的下一次见面会。

localize.description: 計劃近期舉行會所聚會？那麼你需要邀請儘可能多的人到你的房間。讓我們通過社交媒體來進行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的內容放在主圖板上，一次獲得三個平臺的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向儘可能多的人宣佈你的下一次見面會。
